SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.controllers

Class CourseController

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.controllers.CourseController
@Path("/courses") public class CourseController extends Object
REST Controller for managing course-related operations.

Provides endpoints for course retrieval and filtering functionality.

  • Method Details

    • getCoursesWithFilters

      @GET @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getCoursesWithFilters(@QueryParam("id") Long id, @QueryParam("title") String title, @QueryParam("duration") Integer duration, @QueryParam("description") String description, @QueryParam("area") String areaStr, @QueryParam("language") String languageStr, @QueryParam("adminName") String adminName, @QueryParam("courseIsActive") Boolean courseIsActive, @QueryParam("excludeCompletedByUserId") Long excludeCompletedByUserId, @QueryParam("excludeCourseIds") String excludeCourseIdsStr, @QueryParam("parameter") @DefaultValue("title") String parameterStr, @QueryParam("order") @DefaultValue("ASCENDING") String orderStr, @QueryParam("offset") @DefaultValue("0") Integer offset, @QueryParam("limit") @DefaultValue("10") Integer limit)
      Retrieves courses with filtering options.
      Parameters:
      areaStr - Optional filter by course area
      languageStr - Optional filter by course language
      adminName - Optional filter by admin name
      courseIsActive - Optional filter by active status
      offset - Starting position for pagination
      limit - Maximum number of results
      Returns:
      Response with list of filtered course DTOs

    • getCourseImage

      @GET @Path("/{id}/image") @Produces({"application/json","image/jpeg","image/png","image/webp"}) public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getCourseImage(@PathParam("id") Long id, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.Request request, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
      Retrieves the image for a course by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - Course ID.
      request - HTTP request context.
      headers - HTTP headers.
      Returns:
      The course image or error response.

    • uploadCourseImage

      @PUT @Path("/{id}/image") @Consumes("multipart/form-data") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response uploadCourseImage(@PathParam("id") Long id, FileUploadDTO form)
      Uploads or updates a course's image.
      Parameters:
      id - Course ID.
      form - Multipart form containing the image file.
      Returns:
      HTTP 200 (OK) if uploaded, or error response.

    • createCourse

      @POST @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response createCourse(@CookieParam("jwt") String jwtToken, @Valid @Valid CourseNewDTO dto)
      Creates a new course. Only accessible by admins.
      Parameters:
      jwtToken - JWT token from cookie for admin authentication
      dto - The new course data
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure

    • updateCourse

      @PUT @Path("/{id}") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response updateCourse(@CookieParam("jwt") String jwtToken, @PathParam("id") Long id, @Valid @Valid CourseUpdateDTO dto)
      Updates an existing course. Only accessible by admins.
      Parameters:
      jwtToken - JWT token from cookie for admin authentication
      id - The id of the course to update
      dto - The updated course data (fields are optional)
      Returns:
      Response indicating success or failure
